For additional entry requirements for Creative Arts courses, international and domestic students have the same process.

To view the additional entry requirements, visit the course page, select �I�m a high school student� at the top (green circle in the below screenshot) and click on Australia and New Zealand icon (yellow circle in the below screenshot). This will show the QTAC-related additional entry requirements.

Scroll down the page to the �Explore this course� section and select the �Requirements� tab. You will need to submit your QTAC application by 5pm Monday 26 September 2022. You will also need to submit the QUT online registration form�via the QUT website to organise your audition.

If you are seeking information regarding Fees and Scholarships for the course, ensure you click the tab back to Globe icon (yellow circle in the above screenshot), which will then display international student fees and scholarships.

Article_Details__c:
About QUT
QUT is a major Australian university located in sunny Brisbane with a truly global outlook. We have nearly 50,000 students, and our courses are built around practical experience and hands-on learning, which means that you'll build the confidence to succeed in your future career.

QUT has two campuses: Gardens Point and Kelvin Grove. Gardens Point is located right in the heart of Brisbane�s CBD and is the main campus for our business, law, justice, science, IT, maths and engineering students. Kelvin Grove is set around the lively urban village and is the main campus for our health, creative industries and education students.
